backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, payout methods, and withdrawal requests with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/auth tasks to impacted files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing major frontend files and their responsibilities across UI, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining how to build, deploy, and troubleshoot the app with DFX, environment variables, and common commands.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting required UI, states, validations, and flow for the betting top‑up implementation.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist covering all UI elements, interactions, and data behaviors for the crypto wallet dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining theme tokens, light/dark variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root container and frontend application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root layout, authentication gate, profile-setup modal logic, and full TanStack router configuration for app pages.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface to include an initialization method for access control with a secret token.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Provides an admin-only route wrapper that shows loading skeletons or an access-denied message before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Implements a login screen using Internet Identity with disabled mock email/password UI and a dialog for signup/forgot-password info.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp formatting, amount, and status badge.
Loads, filters, and displays local crypto transactions with tabs for all/sent/received and real-time storage updates.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows the crypto balance header with a styled background and a toggle to hide or reveal the displayed balance.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders a horizontal action bar for common crypto operations like send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Displays a list of crypto tokens with icons, balances, and click handling, falling back to a generic icon on load errors.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Buy crypto sheet with asset selection, amount input, validation, and creation of a pending local transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Receive crypto sheet allowing asset selection, address display, clipboard copy, and logging a placeholder received transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Send crypto sheet with asset selection, address and amount inputs, and creation of a pending sent transaction.
Multi‑step flow for withdrawing funds to a bank, including amount entry, payout method selection or creation, and final review.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Swap crypto sheet enabling asset pair selection, amount entry, mock conversion, and creation of a swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard promotional card with illustration and pagination dots encouraging eSIM connectivity.
Reusable dashboard tile component with icon, label, optional route, badge, and coming‑soon state.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Displays a clickable gift card brand row with icon fallback and name.
Renders up to a set number of label chips with an overflow counter.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save custom gift card labels with change detection.
Offers a popover-based interface for filtering gift cards by selectable labels.
Shows a card-styled table of NGN rate tiers for a specific gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays an inline summary of the matched NGN rate tier or an unavailable notice.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet picker allowing users to search and select gift card brands.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount formatting, and status badge.
Main app layout with desktop sidebar, mobile header, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Provides a mobile bottom navigation dock with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Dropdown component for selecting Nigerian banks with search and popover UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and async submit handling.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable tile displaying a bill category with icon and label.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers and preset amount chips for betting services.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Contains conversion rate config and a function to compute gross, fee, and net values.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with icons and search terms plus a filter function.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: NGN rate table config for gift cards, with helpers to get tiers, match amounts, and format labels.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: List of Nigerian banks and a function to filter them by search query.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Vendor list with rates and logic to calculate payouts and select the best vendor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on II identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports hook for fetching the current user's profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, gift cards, withdrawals, and transactions into dashboard-ready data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, including loading stored identities, handling login state, and configuring AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Checks browser notification support, tracks permission state, and offers a safe async method to request permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal notification preferences stored in localStorage with a toggle API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Tracks whether a user has dismissed profile setup using localStorage and exposes suppress/unsuppress helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, gift cards, and withdrawals, including client‑side mapping between backend and frontend types.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Extracts wallet balance and currency from the current user profile for display.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility helpers for class merging, currency formatting, and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin interface to search users, view their KYC records, and update their KYC status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin page listing pending withdrawals with actions to approve or reject them.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing balance, shortcuts, and promo sections with loading states and currency formatting.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Computes the NGN rate tier for a brand and amount by parsing input and matching rate table tiers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for adding a gift card with brand selection, amount, code, and optional image upload.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays detailed gift card info, handles status updates, tag editing, and shows NGN rate table.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with tag-based filtering and navigation to add or view details.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks and displays gift cards by best NGN rate with navigation to details or adding new cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Ranks gift cards by highest NGN rate using rate tables with deterministic tiebreakers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Allows selling a gift card by entering an amount, selecting vendors, and viewing conversion calculations.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays local transaction history, loading and updating from local storage and rendering rows or an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Allows users to submit KYC data with file upload and shows current verification status.
Provides a form to purchase airtime, log a local transaction, and handle basic input validation.
Implements a two-step betting top-up form with provider selection, account ID, amount input, and confirmation, logging transactions locally.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Displays bill payment categories and routes users to specific service pages via a grid of selectable tiles.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Provides a placeholder cable TV bill payment form that logs a mock transaction and shows a ‘coming soon’ notice.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Renders a crypto wallet dashboard with mock token data, quick actions, activity list, and multiple transaction sheets.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Offers a placeholder mobile data purchase form that logs mock transactions and displays a coming-soon alert.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Contains a placeholder electricity bill payment form that logs mock transactions and includes a coming-soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: React page for entering an account ID and amount to log a placeholder internet bill payment as a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for authentication info and notification preferences using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: Handles viewing withdrawal requests, adding payout methods, and submitting new withdrawals using multiple hooks and form inputs.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction storage with functions to add, retrieve, and clear up to 50 stored transactions.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Provides getter and setter utilities for per‑principal notification settings stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Type definitions for app entities including users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC records, payout methods, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for frontend environment variables injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, path aliases, env injection, chunk splitting, proxies, and build settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, listing existing UI-related features for a redesigned login screen and one pending new feature request. Contains metadata like schema versions, project description, and empty notes/issue arrays.
